name: @hack
description:
This game was developed for the second edition of the Level Up! Game Jam event organized by NEI-ISEP.

It was developed during a 48-hour period, using the Cosplay engine.

Theme: An Unconventional Weapon

Awards 🏆
  • Honorary mention

Controls 🎮

Typing

  • Keyboard - Type what's in the terminal

Shooter

  • Arrows - Move the ship
  • Space - Shoot

Team 👥

  • Bárbara Pinto (@MadDinosaur) - Art 🎨
  • Eduardo Correia (@Educorreia932) - Code 💻
  • Eduardo Silva (@eduardocsilva) - Code 💻
